turkish_example_sentence: Ben o karanlık sokakta yalnız olmamış olsaydım, korkmazdım hiç
english_example_sentence: If I had not been alone on that dark street, I would not have been afraid at all
russian_example_sentence: Если бы я не был один на той темной улице, я бы совсем не боялся
